title: Architecture: a performing art
creator_credit: Film Australia and Michael Robertson Film Productions
brief_description: An overview of the career and lifestyle of the Australian architect, John Andrews whose better known accomplishments include the CTT Tower in Toronto - the tallest free-standing structure in the world, the International Shipping Terminal at Miami, the Cameron Offices in Canberra and the American Express Tower in Sydney.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia and Michael Robertson Film Productions
